item.title: Essential Date Functions for Grouping in PostgreSQL
item.description: The past months, I have been working on a feature which deal with grouping records by date and summing up values. I have learn a couple of date functions in PostgreSQL that are very useful when it comes to grouping records together based on datetime column. In this post, we will go through a bit of the context of the feature I work on, and we will walk through the process of implementing it.
